targets.query: select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.health/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc

select last((avail.value * 1.0) / (total.value) * 100) from "$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.total_avail_bytes" as avail inner join "$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.total_bytes" as total  where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.quorum/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.monitor/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.*.pool.total_bytes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.*.pool.total_used_bytes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.*.pool.total_avail_bytes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.*.pool.total_bytes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.*.pool.total_used_bytes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc

select mean((avail.value * 1.0) / (total.value) * 100) from "$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.total_avail_bytes" as avail inner join "$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.total_bytes" as total  where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.*.pool.total_avail_bytes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from /ceph.*.pool.total_number/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.*\.pool.$pool.bytes_used/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.*.pool.$pool.max_avail/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.$pool.op_per_sec/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select sum(value) from merge(/$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.$pool.objects/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.$pool.objects/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.$pool.read_bytes_sec/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.$pool.write_bytes_sec/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.$pool.write_bytes_sec/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.$pool.size/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select max(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pool.$pool.pg_num/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster*.pg.total/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select max(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pg.state/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pg.total/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pg.bytes_avail/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pg.bytes_total/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pg.bytes_used/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.pg.data_bytes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.up/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.down/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.up/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.in/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.down/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.out/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.$osd.used/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.$osd.total/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.$osd.apply_latency/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select min(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.$osd.apply_latency/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.$osd.apply_latency/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.$osd.commit_latency/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select min(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.$osd.commit_latency/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-$cluster.osd.$osd.commit_latency/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
